name: MagiBlade
description:
This is the first developmental version of MagiBlade, a strategy platformer in which the player must use an assortment of weapons and spells to traverse dungeons and collect their hidden treasures.

This release serves mainly to locate and patch early bugs and collect user input on where this game should go with the initial concept. The release contains just one PLACEHOLDER level. I know, its pretty bad.

Controls:

  •  Movement - WASD, Arrow Keys
  • Jumping - Spacebar
  • Climbing - W, Spacebar
  • Attacking (Melee)  - Return Key
  • Attacking (Range) - Click And Drag
